nodes.text: Stradd was a commandant of the Galactic Empire who was captured by a team of New Republic Imperial hunters led by pilot Norra Wexley sometime following the Rebellion on Akiva. After the commandant was successfully captured, the team put Stradd's image up on a board in their SS-54 assault ship the Halo, which included images of all the Imperial targets they had successfully captured.
Stradd was mentioned in the novel Aftermath: Life Debt, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2016.
